DESC.PARA: The image_source() command sends an image of the 2-D unconvolved model associated with a 2-D data set to ds9.

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the data set to use; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")

tile - tile the ds9 frames so that all existing frames are visible; if False
(the default), only the newly-created frame will be visible

DESC.PARA: Image the model associated with the default dataset.
Image the model for dataset id=3. Then image the model for dataset id=2 in a new frame and tile the frames.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
